body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Peter Murphy and the customer's name is Grace Washington.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Peter Murphy, and I'm with Premier Accounting Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Peter, my name is Grace Washington. I'm calling about a billing issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi Grace! I appreciate you reaching out. I’m here to help. Could you please provide me with the account number associated with your billing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also confirm your date of birth for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's March fourth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for that information, Grace. I’m looking at your account now, and I see a discrepancy in the last invoice.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I noticed that. I was charged for services I didn't receive.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Grace. Let me rectify this. I will initiate a review of your billing. Please hold on for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Grace. I've processed the correction, and you will receive an updated invoice shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you, Peter!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Grace! Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
